scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:backtest" "npm run dev:market" "npm run dev:dividend" "npm run dev:transaction"
scripts.test:backtest: node -e "const axios = require('axios'); axios.post('http://localhost:3000/api/v1/backtest', {ticker: 'HYLD.TO', timeframe: '1D', quantity: 1, startDate: '2024-01-01', endDate: '2024-12-31'}).then(r => console.log('✅ Success:', r.data)).catch(e => console.error('❌ Error:', e.response?.data || e.message))"
scripts.check-services: node -e "const services = ['3000', '3001', '3002', '3003', '3004']; const axios = require('axios'); Promise.all(services.map(port => axios.get('http://localhost:' + port + '/health').then(() => console.log('✅ Port ' + port + ' OK')).catch(() => console.log('❌ Port ' + port + ' DOWN'))))"
